com.twofortyfouram.test.context

Class FeatureContextWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • com.twofortyfouram.test.context.FeatureContextWrapper

  • @Immutable
public final class FeatureContextWrapper
extends android.content.ContextWrapper
    Context for faking environment capabilities and permissions. This allows dynamic feature switching to be exercised in a test environment.
